resourceGroups.name: User
resourceGroups.description:
If no authorization header is provided, the request is answered with a `Unauthorized` HTTP status.

If an access token is provided, but does not belong to the same user as the owner of this resource (ie `userId` of the resource), the request is answered with a `Forbidden` status.

requests.name: Valid authentication token pertaining to another user

actions.name: Timeline

requests.name: Valid authentication token pertaining to another user

actions.colorizedUriTemplate: /vrm/v1/users/0123456789/timeline?page=1&size=10&start_date=2016-12-10&end_date=2017-02-28
